subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick, the face of men’s tennis in the United States for over a decade, has a bounce in his step even as his career draws to a close after announcing his retirement.
snippet: Andy Roddick, the face of men’s tennis in the United States for over a decade, has a bounce in his step even as his career draws to a close after announcing his retirement.
